wbml.net.ff(input_size, output_size, widths, nonlinearity=None, normalise=True)[source]¶

A standard feed-forward neural net.

Parameters:
  • input_size (int) – Size of input.
  • output_size (int) – Size of output.
  • widths (tuple of int) – Widths of the layers.
  • nonlinearity (function, optional) – Nonlinearity to use. Defaults to ReLUs.
  • normalise (bool, optional) – Interleave with normalisation layers. Defaults to True.
wbml.net.rnn(input_size, output_size, widths, nonlinearity=None, normalise=False, gru=True, final_dense=False)[source]¶

A standard recurrent neural net.

Parameters:
  • input_size (int) – Size of input.
  • output_size (int) – Size of output.
  • widths (tuple of int) – Widths of the layers.
  • nonlinearity (function, optional) – Nonlinearity to use. Defaults to sigmoid.
  • normalise (bool, optional) – Interleave with normalisation layers. Defaults to False.
  • gru (bool, optional) – Use GRU layers instead of Elman layers. Defaults to True.
  • final_dense (bool, optional) – Append a final dense layer. Defaults to False.
